changelog: small fix for JavLibrary entries without pictures
description:
Idol video info metadata provider. Uses data from javlibrary.com, dmm.co.jp, gekiyasu.co.jp.
Fetches video metadata and cover/box/screenshot images.
DMM scraper has to be run from japanese IP otherwise it will not find most of the videos.
name: IvInfo
overview: Idol video info metadata provider. Uses data from javlibrary.com, dmm.co.jp, gekiyasu.co.jp
